overview:
Amit is the Co-Founder and CEO of Taykey, a trend-based advertising start-up. Taykey was founded in 2008, and is backed by Sequoia Capital and based in Israel.

Amit was also the founder of bWitty / WittySearch a search technology company, and a boutique consulting agency. Amit founded bWitty at the age of 14 in Israel.

As an engineer, gone business and product, Amit has broad experience in all stages of product development and managing turnkey software projects. Highly experienced in designing and implementing applications in the field of web development and computer & network security.

In Sep 2009, Amit was chosen to be one of Israel’s Top 40 under 40 by TheMarker Magazine.

Currently, Amit manages the product and business development side of Taykey among other CEO duties.
